Documentation

Welcome!¶

Let’s start your journey with CIBOS software.

If your ready to start setting up, go to the Introduction.

To see what’s possible click around in the left navigation or Search… field to find relevant information.

Or for a specific issue check out our FAQ.

Why CIBOS?¶

Unlike other iterations of software management tools for CPG, CIBOS is:

  • priced for growth

  • built ground up for Food & Beverage

  • designed for supreme Ease of Use

CIBOS strives to simplify management and focus on business growth by adopting the Kanban Board philosophy where every UI & Workflow is uniformly designed. Each view has two to three lists allowing the user to manage an entire workflow intuitively in every view by editing and moving items from left to right.

Your company maybe using Excel, Google Sheets, or leaving it to an Accountant or accounting software. This approach takes up your time and money and puts you at a distance from your business and is prone to error.

To grow your business you’ll want daily insight. Check out Analytics Overview to get started.

Dive deep into Types of Workflows and understand how to get the most out of managing your companies operations.
